name: Harlequin
cons: No direct damage, relies on other units

talents.name: Copy Unit
talents.description: When merged, creates a copy of any unit with the same merge rank.

description: When merged, creates a copy of any unit with the same merge rank.

name: Dryad
pros: Essential for scaling, enables all strategies

talents.name: Merge Boost
talents.description: Increases the merging rank of the unit it merges with.

description: Increases the merging rank of the unit it merges with.

name: Blade Dancer
pros: Massive damage potential when positioned well

talents.name: Enhanced Mode
talents.description: Without nearby Dancers, gains attack speed bonus.

description: Without any Dancers nearby, enters enhanced mode.

name: Inquisitor
pros: Incredible scaling damage, great vs bosses
cons: Position dependent, needs specific board count

talents.name: Damage Scaling
talents.description: Each hit on same target increases damage.

description: Each hit on the same target increases its damage.

name: Boreas

talents.name: Phase Change
talents.description: Periodically changes firing phase.

description: Periodically changes firing phase for different attack patterns.

name: Summoner
pros: Board presence, potential for powerful summons
cons: RNG dependent, can summon weak units

talents.name: Summon Unit
talents.description: When merged, summons random unit to free tile.

description: When merged, summons a random unit to a free tile.

name: Shaman

talents.name: Rank Control
talents.description: Reduces enemy unit rank in PvP.

description: When merged, stuns unit and applies rank reduction effect.

name: Meteor
pros: Massive AoE burst on merge, clears waves
cons: Damage only on merge, positioning critical

talents.name: Meteorite Drop
talents.description: When merged, drops meteorite on enemies.

description: When merged, drops a meteorite down on enemies.

name: Frost
pros: Excellent crowd control, slows all enemies

talents.name: Blizzard
talents.description: Throws blizzard that slows all opponents.

description: Throws a blizzard at opponents every several seconds.

name: Knight Statue
pros: Massive attack speed boost, enables DPS cards
cons: No damage, needs positioning near DPS

talents.name: Attack Speed Boost
talents.description: Increases attack speed of neighboring units.

description: Increases the attack speed of neighboring units.

name: Hex

talents.name: Instant Kill Chance
talents.description: Gives instant kill chance to 4 neighboring units.

description: Gives an instant kill chance to 4 neighboring units.

name: Trapper
pros: Great crowd control, slows and weakens

talents.name: Net Trap
talents.description: Periodically throws nets that slow monsters.

description: Periodically throws monster-slowing nets onto battlefield.

name: Corsair

talents.name: Explosive Traps
talents.description: Leaves explosive traps on battlefield.

description: The Corsair leaves explosive traps on the battlefield.

name: Demon Hunter
cons: Needs high rank to be effective

talents.name: Multi-Target
talents.description: Attacks multiple first targets equal to merge rank.

description: Attacks a number of first targets equal to her merge rank.

name: Demonologist
pros: Powerful PvP disruption, enemy board control
cons: Useless in PvE, helps opponent in Co-op

talents.name: Summon Monster
talents.description: When merged, summons monster to opponent's side.

description: When merged summons a monster to the opponent's side.

name: Cultist
pros: Incredible with multiple cultists, scales well
cons: Needs multiple copies, hard to set up

talents.name: Cultist Synergy
talents.description: With 1-3 nearby, attacks additional targets.

description: With 1-3 cultists nearby, begins attacking additional targets.

name: Stasis
pros: Stops enemies completely, great crowd control

talents.name: Time Control
talents.description: Creates spheres that stop enemies in place.

description: Creates time control spheres that stop enemies in place.

name: Clock of Power
pros: Powerful speed control, affects all units

talents.name: Speed Control
talents.description: Lowers enemy or increases ally attack speed.

description: Lowers (PvP) or increases (PvE) attack speed of other player's units.

name: Vampire
cons: Low damage, needs time to build value

talents.name: Mana Bite
talents.description: Bites target, making it periodically give mana.

description: Bites the target, making it periodically give mana.

name: Engineer
pros: Incredible damage when connected, scales exponentially

talents.name: Engineer Synergy
talents.description: Connects with other Engineers for damage boost.

description: Connects with other Engineers for increased damage.

name: Plague Doctor
pros: Strong in PvP, disease effects spread

name: Thunderer

name: Executioner

cons: RNG dependent, less effective vs full health

talents.description: Has chance to instantly kill low-health enemies.

name: Mime
pros: Extreme flexibility, can merge with anything

description: Can merge with any other unit of the same rank.

name: Reaper

description: Attacks have a chance to instantly killing the target.

name: Grindstone
pros: Cheap damage boost, good early game
